title: The Judas Syndrome
description: A group of teens on the verge of graduation remain excited and optimistic about their future. But when they return from a camping trip to find themselves faced with a toxic future, they must learn to navigate through the ugliness that the world has not prepared them for, shrouded in conspiracy theory and religious overtones, destiny and fate combine to see past lives reinvented and past events realized. Encountering a multitude of obstacles, and dealing with survivorâ€™s guilt along the way, they must decipher friend from foe, and in the process, choose to survive
author: Michael Poeltl
